languages.text: {n}Равор оборачивается и взирает на вас снизу вверх. Помедлив несколько секунд, он обращается к стоящему рядом с вами Абеляру.{/n} "Сенешаль, Святилище Навигатора молчит. Вокс-сигнал в норме, так что..."

{n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."
languages.original_text: {n}Равор оборачивается и взирает на вас снизу вверх. Помедлив несколько секунд, он обращается к стоящему рядом с вами Абеляру.{/n} "Сенешаль, Святилище Навигатора молчит. Вокс-сигнал в норме, так что..."

{n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

languages.text: {n}雷沃转过身，抬头看着你。他犹豫片刻，之后对站在你身边的阿贝拉德开了口。{/n}“总领，导航者圣所没有任何反应。音阵信号很稳定，这意味着……”
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}雷沃转过身，抬头看着你。他犹豫片刻，之后对站在你身边的阿贝拉德开了口。{/n}“总领，导航者圣所没有任何反应。音阵信号很稳定，这意味着……”

languages.text: {n}Ravor se gira para mirarte. Duda durante unos momentos y acaba dirigiéndose a Abelard, que está a tu lado.{/n} «Senescal, el sanctum de navegantes guarda silencio. La señal de voco es estable, lo que significa que...».
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor se gira para mirarte. Duda durante unos momentos y acaba dirigiéndose a Abelard, que está a tu lado.{/n} «Senescal, el sanctum de navegantes guarda silencio. La señal de voco es estable, lo que significa que...».

languages.text: {n}ラヴォアは振り返ってあなたを見上げる。彼は少しためらい、それからあなたの隣にいるアベラルドに話しかけた。{/n}「家令長、航宙士のサンクトゥムは沈黙しています。しかし、ヴォクス信号は安定しています。つまり…」
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}レイヴァーは振り返ってあなたを見上げる。彼は少しためらい、それからあなたの隣にいるアベラルドに話しかけた。{/n}「家令長、航宙士のサンクトゥムは沈黙しています。ヴォクス信号は安定しています。つまり…」
{n}ラヴォアは振り返ってあなたを見上げる。彼は少しためらい、それからあなたの隣にいるアベラルドに話しかけた。{/n}「家令長、航宙士のサンクトゥムは沈黙しています。しかし、ヴォクス信号は安定しています。つまり…」

languages.text: {n}Ravor se retourne et vous regarde. Il hésite quelques instants avant de s'adresser à Abélard, debout à vos côtés.{/n} « Sénéchal, il n'y a aucun bruit dans le sanctum de navigation. Le signal-vox est stable, ce qui signifie... »
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor se retourne et vous regarde. Il hésite quelques instants avant de s'adresser à Abélard, debout à vos côtés.{/n} « Sénéchal, il n'y a aucun bruit dans le sanctum de navigation. Le signal-vox est stable, ce qui signifie... »

languages.text: {n}Ravor dreht sich um und blickt zu dir auf. Er zögert einige Augenblicke und spricht dann Abelard an, der neben dir steht.{/n} "Truchsess, das Navigator-Sanctum schweigt. Das Vox-Signal ist stabil, was bedeutet ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor dreht sich um und blickt zu dir auf. Er zögert einige Augenblicke und spricht dann Abelard an, der neben dir steht.{/n} "Truchsess, das Navigator-Sanctum schweigt. Das Vox-Signal ist stabil, was bedeutet ..."

languages.text: {n}Ravor, arkasını dönüp sana doğru bakıyor. Kısa bir tereddüdün ardından senin yanı başında duran Abelard'a sesleniyor.{/n} "Seneşal, Rotacı'nın Kutağı sessiz. Voks sinyali stabil, bu da demek oluyor ki..."
languages.original_text: {n}Ravor turns around and looks up at you. He hesitates for a few moments, then addresses Abelard, who is standing next to you.{/n} "Seneschal, the Navigator's Sanctum is silent. The vox-signal is stable, which means..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Ravor, arkasını dönüp sana doğru bakıyor. Kısa bir tereddüdün ardından senin yanı başında duran Abelard'a sesleniyor.{/n} "Seneşal, Rotacı'nın Kutağı sessiz. Voks sinyali stabil, bu da demek oluyor ki..."
